title: Was Senator Chuck Schommer taking a million dollars from "excessive donations"?
subtitle: Tramp's supporters raised the issue of the funding violations of the pre-election campaign to question Schommer's suitability for office in December 2018.
author: David Emery
vclaim: In 1998, Senator Chuck Schommer was arrested, taking $1 million in excessive contributions to the election campaign and did not properly disclose $4.6 million in expenditure, for which he fined $138,000.
